author: .fjl
content: BTW, it would be nice to have a list of all the implementations. Please add yours here: https://github.com/ethereum/devp2p/issues/163

author: deme1744
content: I should also be available to do some interop on Monday. Got the test vectors working (decoding step, have to move the random data generations out to test encoding also) and my own nodes can talk. Just need to do a bit of cleanup still as I rushed a bit to be able to try the test vectors before the weekend.
